Html:
It seems that the Illustration of the Dragon Soul trinket comes in as ZERO dps in the shadowpriest model (somewhere at the end of the trinket list).
It works OK in the mage model.

Am I missing something or it is not included in the shadowpriest model yet?
What are the steps to add it properly if it is possible?
Its proc may not be supported in SPriest yet. You can edit it and add a static 200 spellpower in the meantime.

At least it shows up on your list, AB, heh.  I've been through the list going on six times already and don't even see it.

Is there a way to manually create an item so I can add both it and the static 200 spellpower you suggested, Astrylian?
Procs and Uses are not yet properly reimplemented in ShadowPriest and HolyPriest.
Ah, okies, no worries then.  I can prioritize around it easily enough.  Thanks!
No need to create an item, it's already there. Items with no value aren't displayed in the charts, but you can edit them; Tools > Edit Items...
Since procs and use are not modeled, does that mean we should uncheck the checkbox that says to use it or does it not matter?
*cough* No, that means that checkbox currently does nothing.

Same thing for Elemental Shammy's.  How do I edit the Illustration to account for the buff?  Would I have to do the same for the Eye of the Broodmother?

Thanks and great job!
